Question: the only two non-US TV shows to win the Best Comedy Emmy
the only two animated TV shows nominated for Best Comedy Emmy
the only FX show to win Best Comedy Emmy
the only HBO MAX streaming show to win Best Comedy Emmy
the only Amazon Prime Video show to win Best Comedy Emmy
the only Apple TV+ show to win Best Comedy Emmy
the only 2 Fox shows to win Best Comedy Emmy
the only 2 HBO (not MAX) shows to win Best Comedy Emmy
the first winner of the Best Comedy Emmy
the 2 shows that have won Best Comedy Emmy the most
the 3 shows that have been NOMinated for Best Comedy Emmy the most
Answer: Cheers, Curb Your Enthusiasm, M\*A\*S\*H (11 apiece)

Question: the show with the most Best Comedy Emmy NOM's (not most total Emmy NOM's) without any wins
the show that won Best Comedy Emmy in 2024
the show that won Best Comedy Emmy in 2023
the show that won Best Comedy Emmy in 2021 & 2022
the show that won Best Comedy Emmy in 2020
the show that won Best Comedy Emmy in 2019
the show that won Best Comedy Emmy in 2018
the show that won Best Comedy Emmy from 2015 through 2017
the 3 shows that have been nominated for Best Comedy Emmy that contained a & in their title--and the only one that ever won
Answer: Mork & Mindy; Kate & Allie; and the winner: Will & Grace
